caption.title: Deduced amino acid sequence and structural domains of LsST6.
caption.p: (A) Alignment of amino acid sequences of LsST6 and NlST6. LsST6 had 91.41% identity with NlST6; 12 predicted transmembrane peptides are boxed in red; a conserved GRK domain is boxed in green. (B) Schematic representation of LsST6. A predicted glycosylation site and two predicted substrate-binding domains are marked. (C) Prediction of signal peptide of LsST6. There was no signal peptide in LsST6 according to the analysis using SignalP4.1 ( http://www.cbs.dtu.dk/services/SignalP/).
Click here for additional data file.
